data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Moussa Djenepo of Southampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 3, David Coote signals a free kick to Brighton.
In Falmer Brighton drive forward through Danny Welbeck. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Kyle Walker-Peters for the away team is judged to be offside.
Southampton's Theo Walcott breaks free at American Express Community Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
David Coote blows against Southampton's Che Adams for offside.
In the minute 11, In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lewis Dunk (Brighton) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Southampton have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Free kick Brighton.
Free kick for Brighton in the half of Southampton.
Southampton's Moussa Djenepo has been booked in Falmer.
In the minute 15, In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
David Coote signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
Brighton's Aaron Connolly is whistled for offside at American Express Community Stadium.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Brighton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Brighton.
David Coote signals a Brighton throw-in in Southampton's half.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, In Falmer Southampton's Theo Walcott is caught offside.
Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
Penalty! David Coote points to the spot, great chance for Brighton...
In the minute 26, Goal! Pascal Gross gives Brighton a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
In the minute 28, Free kick for Southampton in the half of Brighton.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
Free kick Southampton.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Brighton.
Brighton's Lewis Dunk has run offside.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Brighton.
In Falmer Brighton attack through Pascal Gross. The finish is off target, however.
David Coote awards Southampton a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
David Coote signals a Brighton throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 35, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton at American Express Community Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
Kyle Walker-Peters (Southampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 38, Southampton to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Southampton are coming forward and Theo Walcott gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 40, Brighton have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
David Coote signals a Southampton throw-in in Brighton's half.
Throw-in Brighton.
In the minute 45, David Coote signals a free kick to Brighton.
Adam Webster for Brighton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Goal! Jannik Vestergaard levels the match at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from James Ward-Prowse.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team replace Moussa Djenepo with Danny Ings.
In Falmer a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Oriol Romeu (Southampton) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 48, David Coote signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Free kick Southampton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Southampton at American Express Community Stadium.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brighton's Yves Bissouma gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Southampton defender.
In the minute 53, Brighton drives forward and Aaron Connolly gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Southampton needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Brighton.
Lewis Dunk is booked for the home team.
In the minute 58, Throw-in Brighton.
Throw-in for Southampton at American Express Community Stadium.
Southampton are pushing forward but Theo Walcott's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the home team in Falmer.
David Coote signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Brighton's area.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 62, In Falmer, Oriol Romeu of Southampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Danny Ings gets his shot on target but fails to score for Southampton.
In the minute 64, Brighton to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Graham Potter is making the team's first substitution at American Express Community Stadium with Neal Maupay replacing Aaron Connolly.
In the minute 66, Brighton's Pascal Gross misses with an attempt on goal.
David Coote awards Southampton a goal kick.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Southampton.
Solly March of Brighton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
The away team have replaced Theo Walcott with Nathan Redmond. This is the second substitution made today by Ralph Hasenhuttl.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in high up the field for Southampton in Falmer.
David Coote signals a Southampton throw-in in Brighton's half.
Southampton's Nathan Redmond misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 74, David Coote awards Brighton a goal kick.
Brighton will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Southampton.
An attacking Southampton player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 80, Pascal Gross (Brighton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Southampton take a 1-2 lead thanks to a Danny Ings spot-kick..
Alireza Jahanbakhsh is replacing Ben White for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 82, Brighton make their third substitution with Leandro Trossard replacing Danny Welbeck.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Falmer.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Brighton are coming forward and Neal Maupay gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Southampton at American Express Community Stadium.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Brighton.
David Coote signals a free kick to Brighton.
David Coote signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Brighton have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Alex McCarthy (Southampton) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Coote signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Yves Bissouma (Brighton) has received a yellow card from David Coote.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Brighton push forward at American Express Community Stadium and Leandro Trossard gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Southampton defence.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton at American Express Community Stadium.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
That's full-time at American Express Community Stadium. The final score is 1-2.
